name: Michael TURNER, Petitioner, v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Turner v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Michael TURNER, Petitioner, v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of February, 2008, the Application Seeking Leave to File Original Process is granted. The Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief and/or Kings Bench Relief is denied, without prejudice to file a petition for expedited disposition of Petitioner’s pending motion with the Philadelphia County Common Pleas Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
941 A.2d 1260
Michael TURNER, Petitioner, v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Petitioner.
No. 174 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 7, 2008.
